value: Heh heh heh...

I, the Demon King's faithful servant,
bask in his radiant power! I shall take
revenge on those who scorned me!

Heh heh heh... You keep watch even
at this time of night? Such a diligent
summoner you are.

Gaze deeply into this azure jewel. Do
you not wish to become lost in its
cerulean depths? Heh heh heh...

My work is far from done. I must not
rest until darkness has snuffed out
every ray of light...

Heh heh heh. You're the summoner?
Very well. Accept this small token.

Heh heh heh... Humans will never
conquer darkness. Drown in a
never-ending night!

Can't you see what the night is
hiding? No... The power of true
fear is not yours to fathom.
Grrr...

I will drown all in unending agony!
Heh heh heh... Heh heh heh heh!

Heh heh heh... You desire my power?
You had best be prepared to pay
the price...

Heh heh heh. I am one of Grado's six
great generals. I have come to be
known as the Blood Beryl...$k$pA name that grants me freedom to
travel the empire unhindered. What
a wonderful benefit for my master.$k$pHumans...are but beasts, living only to
sate their wretched desires. Don't
you agree, $Nu?$k$pHumanity must return to the void...
Yet the unenlightened cannot help
but struggle against such a fate.$k$pFollow me and see what it means to
transcend all others in this world.
Heh heh heh!
ほいっ
Darkness...
ぐあっ
Impudent...
Huhuhu-hahaha!
I'm over here.
Cower in fear!
Drown in the mud!
You're too late to stop it...
Heh heh heh...
I am Riev. Riev the Blood Beryl. Heh heh heh...
Hm? Do not bother me with foolishness. I am too busy...
Humans will never conquer darkness. Drown in a never-ending night.

I, the Demon King's faithful servant, will
bask in his radiant power.

He believes that thing is his wife...
Aren't people amusing?

Mansel... You should never have excommunicated me.
The Demon King will be your new master!

Leave everything to your humble
servant, Riev. Heh heh heh...
Very well...
Good. Very good.
As you will.
